body: Hi Moose! I haven't checked the updates in EnergyPlus 8.4. There might be some issues in loading the results as they may have changed output names. Otherwise it's usually fine. If you [update Ladybug and Honeybee](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Update_Ladybug_and_Honeybee) the latest version works by EP 8.3 by default.
